eas_text: A civil authority has issued A CHILD ABDUCTION EMERGENCY for the following counties or areas: Missouri; at 09:15 PM ON JAN 22, 2026 Effective until 10:15 PM. Message from WSLF/CAP.
extra_text:
THIS IS A CANCELLATION OF AN AMBER ALERT THAT WAS ISSUED BY KANSAS CITY MO POLICE DEPARTMENT  ON 01/22/2026 AT 06:30 PM.  

ABDUCTED WAS MAKA ISSACK, BLACK, FEMALE, AGE 10. 
ABDUCTED WAS YAQUB ISSACK, BLACK, MALE, AGE 8. 

CHILDREN WERE LOCATED SAFE.
